Three files in this torrent.

1. LEGOLOTR.exe
2. rldata.dll
3. rld.dll

Found a fix that worked for me... 

The crack comes with three files.
1. LEGOLOTR.exe
2. rld.dll
3. rldata.dll

Just make sure you have those 3 files in your folder.  When you download this crack or the main torrent the AV detects some kind of virus in the rld.dll and auto deletes it. But if you hide the download from your AV you can have it. Just make sure you keep hiding that file from your AV where ever you put it. Probably not totally safe...    but fuck it.

Another Problem ... After Mines Of Moria Mission ... the game Stucks When Comes that i unlocked Boromir .. Any Help ?
Azaq any help then ? or no ? ;(

On Win 7 64 bit, the (c) and tm symbols in the folder name cause the "rld.dll failed to initialize" problem some people are getting. Rename the folder without those symbols, then add the folder to your AV exception list to allow the game to run as normal.
